channel.title: Need help on making a client
channel.description: well i downloaded a client and its for some other crap server.... now how do i make it and edit it to be for my own server!!??

item.title: Need help on making a client
item.dc:creator: @danimaster danimaster
item.description:
@danimaster wrote:

well u know i still dont get how to edit my client to make it run my own server…not pwnscape.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 03:19:14 am[/size][hr][quote=“lolipwn, post:2, topic:256860”]ok heres what you need to do

  1. you need to download Hamachi.
  2. you need to make a server on hamachi.
  3. you need to open up notepad or what ever you use… can be wordpad or what ever I use notepad my self.
  4. Go to EGUI.java and drag it into your notepad next find the part where it has some random numbers inside of these so it looks like “#.##.###.###”, “#.##.###.###”, “#.##.###.###” or just one like “#.##.###.###”,"","" so then you need to fill in the #'s with your hamachi ip. when you do that you save it.
  5. Go to Frame_sub.java and drag it into notepad and you should see something like this:import java.awt.Frame;
    import java.awt.Graphics;

public final class Frame_Sub1 extends Frame
{
private boolean aBoolean35;
Applet_Sub1 anApplet_Sub1_36;

public Frame_Sub1(Applet_Sub1 paramApplet_Sub1, int paramInt1, byte paramByte, int paramInt2)
{
this.aBoolean35 = true;
this.anApplet_Sub1_36 = paramApplet_Sub1;
setTitle("********** Client made by *****");
setResizable(false);
show();
if (paramByte != 5)
this.aBoolean35 = (!(this.aBoolean35));
toFront();
resize(paramInt1 + 8, paramInt2 + 28);
}

public Graphics getGraphics()
{
Graphics localGraphics = super.getGraphics();
localGraphics.translate(4, 24);
return localGraphics;
}

Edit the “********** Client made by *****” to what you want the *'s are to block out mine. once you finish with that you should save then exit out of that.

  1. open up the client.java in notepad and there should be alot of stuff so say your useing a deltascape source all you need to do is controll and H then a screen will pop up and say find and replace or what ever in the topone type in Delta and in the replace part type in the name of your server with out the scape. then do replace and it should replace all the delta stuff.

  2. Compile all the stuff you edited and saved and there you go:D just make shure you edit more stuff to make shure your not 310% leaching it.

  3. Enjoy your server till you get bored and want to get a life.

Please rep me if you can.

Thanks:
lolipwn aka Frozn.[/quote]all that didnt help lol!! i tried what u told me to do…but no use…still connects to same server

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on making a client

item.title: Need help on making a client
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

[quote=“lolipwn, post:2, topic:256860”]ok heres what you need to do

  1. you need to download Hamachi.
  2. you need to make a server on hamachi.
  3. you need to open up notepad or what ever you use… can be wordpad or what ever I use notepad my self.
  4. Go to EGUI.java and drag it into your notepad next find the part where it has some random numbers inside of these so it looks like “#.##.###.###”, “#.##.###.###”, “#.##.###.###” or just one like “#.##.###.###”,"","" so then you need to fill in the #'s with your hamachi ip. when you do that you save it.
  5. Go to Frame_sub.java and drag it into notepad and you should see something like this:import java.awt.Frame;
    import java.awt.Graphics;

public final class Frame_Sub1 extends Frame
{
private boolean aBoolean35;
Applet_Sub1 anApplet_Sub1_36;

public Frame_Sub1(Applet_Sub1 paramApplet_Sub1, int paramInt1, byte paramByte, int paramInt2)
{
this.aBoolean35 = true;
this.anApplet_Sub1_36 = paramApplet_Sub1;
setTitle("********** Client made by *****");
setResizable(false);
show();
if (paramByte != 5)
this.aBoolean35 = (!(this.aBoolean35));
toFront();
resize(paramInt1 + 8, paramInt2 + 28);
}

public Graphics getGraphics()
{
Graphics localGraphics = super.getGraphics();
localGraphics.translate(4, 24);
return localGraphics;
}

Edit the “********** Client made by *****” to what you want the *'s are to block out mine. once you finish with that you should save then exit out of that.

  1. open up the client.java in notepad and there should be alot of stuff so say your useing a deltascape source all you need to do is controll and H then a screen will pop up and say find and replace or what ever in the topone type in Delta and in the replace part type in the name of your server with out the scape. then do replace and it should replace all the delta stuff.

  2. Compile all the stuff you edited and saved and there you go:D just make shure you edit more stuff to make shure your not 310% leaching it.

  3. Enjoy your server till you get bored and want to get a life.

Please rep me if you can.

Thanks:
lolipwn aka Frozn.[/quote]
DO NOT DOWNLOAD HAMATCHI it is a VERY dangerous program that can put your computer at serious risk of a virus… you can taunt the devil if you want… but i suggest you dont, he bites back hard

Read full topic

What the hell?
